hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.master.business.CustomValueList(entity.entityId ,label.localeId,label.labelName) from org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpEntity entity, org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpLabelEntity label where entity.entityId = label.lookUpEntity.entityId and entity.entityType=:entityType

select new org.mifos.application.master.business.CustomValueListElement( lookup.lookUpId,lookup.lookUpName, lookup.lookUpName) from org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueEntity lookup, org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpEntity entity where entity.entityType=:entityType and lookup.lookUpEntity.entityId =entity.entityId
